title: Floral Watch Face
summary: Floral Watch Face has four different background patterns to choose from.
description: Floral Watch Face has four different background patterns to choose from, "Amy", "Anne-Laure", "Heather" and "Natalie"To access the different backgrounds:•   When changing watch faces, scroll to "Floral Watch Face" and click the gear icon below it.•   Scroll through the four background options.•   Select the background by tapping on the name.Please note: Floral Watch Face may take some time to appear on your Android Wear Watch. Be patient, it WILL show up!
descriptionHTML:
Floral Watch Face has four different background patterns to choose from, "Amy", "Anne-Laure", "Heather" and "Natalie"

To access the different backgrounds:
•  When changing watch faces, scroll to "Floral Watch Face" and click the gear icon below it.
•  Scroll through the four background options.
•  Select the background by tapping on the name.

Please note: Floral Watch Face may take some time to appear on your Android Wear Watch. Be patient, it WILL show up!
comments: Beauties! Love these watch faces! Beautiful selections for your personality.
Couldn't change the faces even on my phone.
So cute. Wish there were more
recentChanges: Stand alone release for Wear 2.0 watches
Support for those using iPhones with Android Wear
